title: LA 92
description: Previously unseen footage is shaped into a fresh and timely retelling of the 1992 Rodney King trial -- and the verdict that sparked civil unrest.

title: Last Chance U
description: Elite athletes with difficult pasts turn to junior college football for a last shot at turning their lives around and achieving their dreams.

title: Lessons from a School Shooting: Notes from Dunblane
description: Two priests -- one from Dunblane, Scotland, the other from Newtown, Connecticut -- bond over school tragedies that occurred 16 years apart.

title: Let It Fall: Los Angeles 1982-1992
description: This documentary chronicles simmering tension and broken trust between L.A.'s black community and police in the decade before the Rodney King riots.

title: Liberated: The New Sexual Revolution
description: Filmmakers explore how pop culture shapes a new generation's beliefs about gender, sexuality and violence on display among students on spring break.

title: Liberating a Continent: John Paul II and the Fall of Communism
description: Cultural and intellectual luminaries offer varied insights into Pope John Paul II’s role in bringing down Europe’s Eastern Bloc.

title: Life 2.0
description: Computer users across the globe log onto the virtual world of Second Life. But some users' lives are dramatically consumed by this alternate reality.

title: Lo and Behold: Reveries of the Connected World
description: Filmmaker Werner Herzog presents a history of the internet, starting with its birth in 1969, and ponders the joys and sorrows of its social influence.

title: Long Shot
description: When Juan Catalan is arrested for a murder he didn't commit, he builds his case for innocence around raw footage from a popular TV show. A documentary.

title: Look & See: A Portrait of Wendell Berry
description: Shot across four seasons of farming, this documentary features interviews and observations about writer Wendell Berry's agrarian lifestyle.

title: Look at Us Now, Mother!
description: A documentary filmmaker turns the lens on her dysfunctional relationship with her mother in an effort to heal the wounds of their troubled past.

title: Love, Sweat and Tears
description: Ob-gyn Dr. Pamela Dee Gaudry presents a frank discussion about the effects of menopause on sexual health and the best methods to reclaim intimacy.

title: LoveTrue
description: In this blend of documentary and dramatization, circumstances test notions of love held by a young stripper, a single-dad surfer and a teen musician.
